categori ii (nation park) forc water decor cave almost endless array spectacular limeston format column array stalactit locat eddi county, new mexico, u.s. nearest&#160;c carlsbad coordin 32°10′31″n 104°26′38″w﻿ / ﻿32.17528°n 104.44389°w﻿ / 32.17528; -104.44389coordinates: 32°10′31″n 104°26′38″w﻿ / ﻿32.17528°n 104.44389°w﻿ / 32.17528; -104.44389 area 46,766 acr (18,926&#160;ha) 339 acr (137&#160;ha) private[1] establish may 14, 1930 visitor 397,309 (in&#160;2014)[2] governing&#160;bodi nation park servic unesco world heritag site type natur criteria vii, viii design 1995 (19th session) reference&#160;no. 721 state parti &#160;unit state region north america carlsbad cavern nation park unit state nation park guadalup mountain southeastern new mexico. primari attract park show cave, carlsbad cavern. carlsbad cavern nation park open everi day year except thanksgiving, christmas, new year' day. visitor cave hike via natur entranc take elev visitor center. park entranc locat us highway 62/180, approxim 18 mile (29&#160;km) southwest carlsbad, new mexico. carlsbad cavern nation park particip junior ranger program.[3] park two entri nation regist histor places: cavern histor district rattlesnak spring histor district.[4] approxim two third park set asid wilder area, help ensur futur chang made habitat. carlsbad cavern includ larg cave chamber, big room, natur limeston chamber almost 4,000 feet (1,220&#160;m) long, 625 feet (191&#160;m) wide, 255 feet (78&#160;m) high highest point. fifth largest chamber north america twenty-eighth largest world. content 1 geolog 1.1 capitan reef 1.2 speleogenesi 2 histori 2.1 legisl histori 3 name room 4 tourist inform 5 recent explor 6 cave 7 bat 8 attract 9 see also 10 refer 11 extern link geology[edit] detail region' geology, see delawar basin. capitan reef[edit] estim 250 million year ago, area surround carlsbad cavern nation park serv coastlin inland sea. present sea plethora marin life, whose remain form reef.[5] unlik modern reef growths, permian reef contain bryozoans, sponges, microorganisms. permian period, water evapor reef buri evaporit sediments. tecton movement occur late cenozoic, uplift reef ground. suscept erosion, water sculpt guadalup mountain region present-day state.[6] speleogenesis[edit] carlsbad cavern nation park situat bed limeston groundwat level. cavern development, within groundwat zone.[cit needed] deep limeston petroleum reserv (part mid-contin oil field). time near end cenozoic, hydrogen sulfid (h2s) began seep upward petroleum groundwater. combin hydrogen sulfid oxygen water form sulfur acid: h2s&#160;+&#160;2o2&#160;→&#160;h2so4. sulfur acid continu upward, aggress dissolv limeston deposit form caverns. presenc gypsum within cave confirm occurr process, byproduct reaction sulfur acid limestone.[5] acid groundwat drain caverns, speleothem began deposit within cavern. eros ground creat natur entranc carlsbad cavern within last million years. exposur surfac allow influx air cavern. rainwat snowmelt percol downward ground pick carbon dioxide; water reach cavern ceiling, precipit evaporates, leav behind small calcium carbon deposit. growth roof downward form process known stalactites. additionally, water floor cavern contain carbon acid gener miner deposit evaporation. growth floor upward process known stalagmites. differ format speleothem includ columns, soda straws, draperies, helictites, popcorn. chang ambient air temperatur rainfal affect rate growth speleothems, higher temperatur increas carbon dioxid product rate within overli soil. color speleothem determin trace constitu miner formation.[cit needed] history[edit] young boy, jim white explor cavern homemad wire ladder. grew older, consider doubt whether cave actual existed. name mani rooms, includ big room, new mexico room, king palace, queen chamber, papoos room, green lake room. also name mani cave' promin formations, totem pole, witch' finger, giant dome, bottomless pit, fairyland, iceberg rock, templ sun, rock ages. town carlsbad, lend name cavern nation park, turn name czech town formerli known german name karlsbad (english spell carlsbad) known czech name karlovi vary, mean "charles' bath[s]."[cit needed] 1932, visitor cavern walk switch back ramp-sidewalk took 750 feet (230&#160;m) surface. walk back tire lot visitors. 1932 nation park open larg visitor center build contain two elev would take visitor cavern below. new center includ cafeteria, wait room, museum first aid area.[7] legisl history[edit] octob 25, 1923 – presid calvin coolidg sign proclam (1679-oct. 25, 1923-43 stat. 1929) establish carlsbad cave nation monument.[8] april 2, 1924 – presid calvin coolidg issu execut order (3984) possibl nation park monument site.[9] may 3, 1928 – supplement execut order (4870) issu reserv addit land possibl monument park.[10] may 14, 1930 – act unit state congress (46 stat. 279) establish carlsbad cavern nation park direct secretari interior administ nation park service.[11] june 17, 1930 – presid herbert hoover sign execut order 5370 reserv addit land classification.[12] novemb 10, 1978 – carlsbad cavern wilder establish nation park recreat act (95-625) sign presid jimmi carter.[13] “ ... limeston cavern known carlsbad cave, extraordinari proport unusu beauti varieti natur decoration; ... beyond spaciou chamber explored, vast chamber unknown charact dimens exist; ... sever chamber contain stalactites, stalagmites, format unusu number, size, beauti form, varieti figur make cavern equal, superior, scientif popular interest better known cave ... ” name rooms[edit] rock age big room, photo ansel adams, c. 1941 tour rout outsid entranc caverns. balloon ballroom locat ceil main entranc hall, small room first access tie rope bunch balloon float passage. bat cave large, unadorn rocki passag connect main entranc corridor. major cave' bat popul live portion cave, mine bat guano earli 20th century. bell cord room name long, narrow stalactit come hole ceiling, resembl rope come roof belfry. room locat end left hand tunnel. bifrost room discov 1982, locat ceil lake clouds. name refer nors myth world sky access earth rainbow. room given name locat lake cloud color oxide-stain formations. big room hall giant largest chamber carlsbad caverns, floor space 357,469 squar feet (33,210&#160;m2).[14] chocol high maze small passag total nearli mile (1500 m) combin length, discov 1993 mud-fil pit new mexico room known chocol drop. green lake room uppermost "scenic rooms", name deep, malachite-color pool corner room. 1940s, militari test feasibl carlsbad cavern emerg fallout shelter, green lake use look rippl caus nuclear bomb test mani mile away. none appeared. guadalup room discov park ranger 1966, second largest room carlsbad caverns. known dens collect "soda straw" stalactites. hall white giant larg chamber contain large, white stalagmite. ranger regularli lead special wild-cav tour room. halloween hall room roughli 30 feet length locat spirit world. name discoveri octob 31, 2013. king' palac first four chamber wing known "scenic rooms", name larg castle-lik format center room. lake cloud lowest known point cave. locat side passag left hand tunnel. name larg lake contain globular, cloud-lik rock format form water lake level much higher. left hand tunnel long, straight passag mark deep fissur floor. fissur known lead anywhere. left hand tunnel lead lake cloud bell cord room. mabel' room moderate-s room locat past talcum passag lower cave. mysteri room large, slope room locat queen' chamber, name unexplain nois heard here. small vertic passag far end connect lower cave. new mexico room locat adjac green lake room access mean somewhat narrow corridor. new section section fissur east white giant format parallel bat cave. new discoveri still made section. papoos room locat king' palac queen' chamber. queen' chamber wide regard beauti scenic area cave. jim white' lantern went chamber exploring, dark half hour. spirit world locat ceil big room highest point (an area known top cross), area fill white stalagmit resembl angel room' discoverers. talcum passag room locat lower cave floor coat gypsum dust. rookeri one larger room lower cave. larg number cave pearl found area. underground lunchroom locat big room head left hand tunnel. contain cafeteria built 1950s, elev visitor center exit cave. panorama cavern' interior. tourist information[edit] map park ground carlsbad cavern see averag 407,211 visitor everi year.[2] highest attend seen year 876,500 visitor 1976.[15] 2011, total 41,654,278 visitor enter park. peak visit typic occur weekend follow memori day fourth july. free admitt self-guid tour often grant holiday martin luther king, jr. weekend, nation park week, veteran day weekend.[16] camp permit back countri park, permit requir visitor center. one extra event host park view bat flight. program given earli even amphitheat near main entranc prior start flight, vari sunset time. flight program schedul memori day weekend middl october.[17] optim view normal occur juli august arriv bat pup addit normal migratori bats. morn program also host pre-dawn wit return bat cave. year, bat flight breakfast held visitor eat breakfast park prior morn return bats. variou time throughout year, star parti host park night. ranger host inform program celesti night sky telescop also made available. parti often held conjunct special astronom events, transit venus.[18] recent exploration[edit] 1985 distinct method explor invented. dome area 255 feet (78&#160;m) big room floor far bottomless pit, stalagmit lean out. use balsa wood loop helium-fil balloon attached, explorers—aft sever tri sever years—float lightweight cord snag target stalagmite. cord posit up, over, back ground, climb rope pull position, explor ascend name spirit world.[19] similar, smaller room found main entranc corridor, name balloon ballroom honor technique. 1993, seri small passag total nearli mile combin length found ceil new mexico room. name "chocol high", largest discoveri cave sinc guadalup room found 1966. bottomless pit origin said bottom. stone toss it, sound stone strike bottom heard. later explor reveal bottom 140 feet (43&#160;m) deep cover soft dirt. stone made sound struck bottom lodg soft soil. octob 31, 2013, cave technician explor spirit world area discov new chamber hundr feet main area. dub "halloween hall" date discovery, fresh find mark biggest discoveri cavern 25 years. room' diamet 100 feet (30&#160;m), 1,000 bat bone discov insid room.[20] caves[edit] park contain 119 caves.[21] three cave open public tours. carlsbad cavern famou fulli develop electr lights, pave trails, elevators. slaughter canyon cave[22] spider cave[23] undeveloped, except design path guid "adventure" cave tours. lechuguilla cave well known delic speleothem pristin underground environment. guano mine occur pit entranc 1910s.[24] gain permiss nation park manag dig rubbl pile wind whistl rock weather changed, caver broke room 1986.[24] 120 mile (190&#160;km) cave passag explor mapped.[24] map depth 1,600 feet (490&#160;m), make second deepest limeston cave u.s.[25] protect fragil environment, access limit permit scientif expedit only.[24] bats[edit] mexican free-tail bat emerg natur entranc fli nearest water seventeen speci bat live park, includ larg number mexican free-tail bats.[26] estim popul mexican free-tail bat number million declin drastic modern times. caus declin unknown pesticid ddt often list primari cause. popul appear increas recent year significantli level formerli estim present.[cit needed] studi publish 2009 team boston univers question whether million bat ever exist caverns.[27] mani techniqu use estim bat popul cave. recent success attempt involv use thermal imag camera track count bats.[28] count 2005 estim peak 793,000.[26] mexican free-tail bat present april may late octob earli november.[29] emerg dens group, corkscrew upward counterclockwise, usual start around sunset last three hours.[30] (jim white decid investig cavern saw bat distanc first thought volcano whirlwind.)[31] everi earli even memori day weekend mid octob (with possibl except bad weather), ranger give talk bat visitor sit amphitheat wait watch bat come out.[29] attractions[edit] carlsbad cavern amphitheat three hike trail unpav drive provid access desert sceneri ecosystem. develop portion around cave entranc design cavern histor district.[32] detach part park, rattlesnak spring picnic area, natur oasi landscaping, picnic tables, wildlif habitats. wood riparian area desert, home remark varieti birds, 300 speci recorded[33] 500 speci record whole state new mexico.[34] rattlesnak spring design histor district nation regist histor places.[35] nation audubon societi design rattlesnak spring import bird area (iba). natur entranc cavern also iba coloni cave swallows, possibl world' biggest.[33] antibiotics-resist bacteria discov isol little-visit cave (lechuguilla cave) park.[36] see also[edit] u.s. forest servic blanchard spring cavern mammoth cave
